note:
When I was a kid video games and my PCJr were pretty much my ownly friends. That started me off in the geek world when the world made it a very big detriment to your popularity. Now geeks rule the world and I am part of it.
I love focusing on where politics and the tech world combine. I think that is a very important part of our lives that is misunderstood by many people. I hope to elevate the knowledge of all those who follow me.
